title: The speech which the speaker of the House of Commons made unto the king in the Banqueting-House at Whitehall; November 9. 1660.
author: Grimston, Harbottle, Sir, 1603-1685.
publisher: Printed by John Bill Printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,
notes: Speaker of the House of Commons = Sir Harbottle Grimston.
